uvi.description:
clk: sunxi-ng: Unregister clocks/resets when unbinding

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.5 by commit b5dd513daa70ee8f6d281a20bd28485ee9bb7db2. For more details please see the references link.
